word: A. T. JONES--IF YOU PERPETUATE IT, YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE. HERE ARE THESE TESTIMONIES THAT HAVE BEEN BEFORE US ALL THE TIME. DO NOT ASK BROTHER SMITH WHETHER HE IS SATISFIED, WHEN GOD IS NOT SATISFIED. AND DO NOT EXPLAIN EVERYTHING AWAY, WHEN THIS TESTIMONY CAME LAST MONTH, EXPOSING THE WHOLE THING, AND CALLING FOR A RESTITUTION.
